text: Ani te loka jyanni kupra (inkara) kela jya divasi jahannamacya samora anale jatila (ani tyanna sangitale ja'ila) ki kaya he satya nahi? Tevha te uttara detila ki hoya, ka navhe? Sapatha ahe amacya palanakartyaci (he agadi satya ahe). (Allaha) pharmavila ki ata apalya inkaracya mobadalyata azabaca svada cakha
